\begin{axdef}
	MAX\_ESEL : \nat \\
 MAX\_PID : \nat 
\where
 MAX\_ESEL = 3 \\
 MAX\_PID = 3
\end{axdef}

\begin{zed}
	ESID ::= ES \ldata 1 \upto MAX\_ESEL \rdata
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	PID ::= PD \ldata 1 \upto MAX\_PID \rdata
\end{zed}

\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	UStatus ::= uok | ufail
\end{zed}

\begin{zed}
	FStatus ::= fail \ldata ESID \rdata | NA
\end{zed}
